name: Battlewake®: Hellforge (offline play )
description:
![null](<http://farm2.static.flickr.com/1309/5181565712_4b275092b7.jpg>)

Battlewake®: Hellforge (offline play )

The 4th map for the Battlewake® series

Battlewake Collectives is a collection of highly detailed maps that aims to expand new terrain scenarios for you single-offline players out there This map is for single player off-line play and pits you in a 2 on 2 random race battle with an AI ally against 2 random AI opponents (very hard/insane) difficulties. maps are fairly balanced with 2 different mirrored handicapped starting positions. (opposite positions are fairly balanced).

Feel free to drop in your comments/critics that could help me adjust the maps or if you want more Battlewake Maps posted, please give me a heads-up, if I get enough requests I may then add in more maps for you to enjoy.

TO PLAY THE GAME: double click the file to open map editor and click on the map test button (run map)

**Try other maps from Battlewake®**

Have Fun!
